thread.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 Comes in at 45 GB on Xbox One
thread.title_full: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 Comes in at 45 GB on Xbox One - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 Comes in at 45 GB on Xbox One
text: It seems that one of the defining features of the coming range of titles designed specifically for current gen consoles will be their size, with the long-awaited Call of Duty: Black Ops 3 set to occupy no less than 45 GB on the Xbox One. The information comes from the official listing for the game and might be bad news for those who are seeking to get the title via digital... Â»
